member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.EffectBorderMode
member.summary: Enumeration type that specifies how to process border pixels.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.EffectBorderMode.Soft
member.summary: Pixels outside the edge are marked as black which makes edge color softer after processing.

remarks.p: The effect pads the input image with transparent black pixels for samples outside of the input bounds when it applies the convolution kernel. This creates a soft edge for the image, and in the process expands the output bitmap by the size of the kernel.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.EffectBorderMode.Hard
member.summary: Pixels outside the bounds are mirrored.

remarks.p: The effect extends the input image with a mirror-type border transform for samples outside of the input bounds. The size of the output bitmap is equal to the size of the input bitmap.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.EffectOptimization
member.summary: Enumeration type that specifies speed quality trade-off.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.EffectOptimization.Quality
member.summary: Maximum quality for this effect is achieved by losing speed.
